test_scenarios.name: Account Creation - Successful Registration
steps: Click on 'Sign Up' or 'Get Started Free'.
Enter valid email address, full name, and desired password.
Agree to the terms and conditions.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is redirected to the BrowserStack dashboard and receives a verification email.

test_scenarios.name: Login - Successful Login
steps: Enter the registered email address and password.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the BrowserStack dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Live - Start a New Live Session
steps: Select a browser and operating system.
test_scenarios.expected_result: A new Live session is initiated, and the user can interact with the virtual machine.
